Does no-one read the "x@:[>/* manual?

10 May 2018

/* manual?" />

Sometimes, I meet with a client and it is very clear that they want me to write some specific documentation - but they themselves have zero interest in it. It is simply a check box exercise for them to fulfil some externally imposed requirement. There is an implicit message that no-one will read the manual. [read more]
